content.rendered:
As a student at the University of La Verne, you will benefit from many technology resources such as the high-speed internet connection, wireless network, life-long email account, online learning materials, and more. Here is a list of to-dos to get you started with using these technology resources:

  • How to get your La Verne Portal account to register for classes, check your grades, and view your financial aid info online;
  • How to get your student email account;
  • How to setup your La Verne Portal account
  • How to get Internet access in the residence halls
